languages.text: "Язык — явно лишняя часть твоего тела, Вил'Руолдо. Не беспокойся. Это поправимый изъян".

traits.locale_text: [draft] "Язык — явно лишняя часть твоего тела, Вил'Руолдо. Но не беспокойся, это поправимый дефект".
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: "Your tongue is a quite superfluous part of your body, Vil'Ruoldo. Worry not — this flaw is easy to correct."
languages.original_text: "Язык — явно лишняя часть твоего тела, Вил'Руолдо. Не беспокойся. Это поправимый изъян".

traits.locale_text: "Your tongue is a superfluous part of your body, Vil'Ruoldo. Worry not — this flaw is easy to correct."
"Your tongue is a superfluous part of your body, Vil'Ruoldo. Worry not — this flaw is easy to correct."
"Your tongue is a quite superfluous part of your body, Vil'Ruoldo. Worry not — this flaw is easy to correct."

"Your tongue is a quite superfluous part of your body, Vil'Ruoldo. Worry not — this flaw is easy to correct."

languages.text: "Eure Zunge ist ein recht überflüssiger Teil Eures Körpers, Vil'Ruoldo. Aber keine Sorge – dieser Fehler lässt sich korrigieren."
languages.original_text: "Your tongue is a quite superfluous part of your body, Vil'Ruoldo. Worry not — this flaw is easy to correct."

traits.locale_text: "Eure Zunge ist ein recht überflüssiger Teil Eures Körpers, Vil'Ruoldo. Aber keine Sorge – dieser Fehler lässt sich korrigieren."

languages.text: « Votre langue vous est superflue, Vil'Ruoldo. Ne vous inquiétez pas. Un tel défaut est facile à corriger. »
languages.original_text: "Your tongue is a quite superfluous part of your body, Vil'Ruoldo. Worry not — this flaw is easy to correct."

traits.locale_text: « Votre langue vous est superflue, Vil'Ruoldo. Ne vous inquiétez pas. Un tel défaut est facile à corriger. »

languages.text: “很显然，你的舌头实在是太多余了，敌者罗尔多。不过别担心，这个问题很容易就能纠正。”
languages.original_text: "Your tongue is a quite superfluous part of your body, Vil'Ruoldo. Worry not — this flaw is easy to correct."

traits.locale_text: “很显然，你的舌头实在是太多余了，敌者罗尔多。不过别担心，这个问题很容易就能纠正。”

languages.text: «Su lengua es una parte superflua de su cuerpo, Vil'Ruoldo. No se preocupe: ese error tiene fácil arreglo».
languages.original_text: "Your tongue is a quite superfluous part of your body, Vil'Ruoldo. Worry not — this flaw is easy to correct."

traits.locale_text: «Su lengua es una parte superflua de su cuerpo, Vil'Ruoldo. No se preocupe: ese error tiene fácil arreglo».

languages.text: 「ルオルド、お前の舌は、お前の身体にとってずいぶん余計な部位のようだな。だが心配はいらない、この欠陥は簡単に修正できる」
languages.original_text: "Your tongue is a quite superfluous part of your body, Vil'Ruoldo. Worry not — this flaw is easy to correct."

traits.locale_text: 「ルオルド、お前の舌は、お前の身体にとってずいぶん余計な部位のようだな。だが心配はいらない、この欠陥は簡単に修正できる」

languages.text: "Dilin, vücudunun oldukça gereksiz bir parçası Vil'Ruoldo. Endişelenme, bu kusuru düzeltmek kolaydır."
languages.original_text: "Your tongue is a quite superfluous part of your body, Vil'Ruoldo. Worry not — this flaw is easy to correct."
